svg.script: async_test(t => { let anim = document.getElementById("anim"); onload = t.step_func(() => { anim.endElement(); anim.beginElement(); requestAnimationFrame(t.step_func_done(() => { assert_equals(getComputedStyle(anim.parentNode).fill, "rgb(0, 128, 0)"); })); }); }, "endElement() on an inactive element");
